message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $152.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit shy of $152.50. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $150, but that's as low as I can go. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $150, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $148?
